commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
const els = {
  enabled: document.getElementById("enabled"),
  replacement: document.getElementById("replacement"),
  words: document.getElementById("words"),
  matchWholeWords: document.getElementById("matchWholeWords"),
  caseInsensitive: document.getElementById("caseInsensitive"),
  save: document.getElementById("save"),
  status: document.getElementById("status")
}

const load = async () => {
  const s = await chrome.storage.sync.get([
    "enabled",
    "replacement",
    "words",
    "matchWholeWords",
    "caseInsensitive"
  ])

  els.enabled.checked = s.enabled ?? true
  els.replacement.value = s.replacement ?? "REDACTED"
  els.words.value = Array.isArray(s.words) ? s.words.join("\n") : ""
  els.matchWholeWords.checked = s.matchWholeWords ?? true
  els.caseInsensitive.checked = s.caseInsensitive ?? true
}

const save = async () => {
  const words = els.words.value
    .split("\n")
    .map(s => s.trim())
    .filter(Boolean)

  await chrome.storage.sync.set({
    enabled: els.enabled.checked,
    replacement: els.replacement.value || "",
    words,
    matchWholeWords: els.matchWholeWords.checked,
    caseInsensitive: els.caseInsensitive.checked
  })

  els.status.textContent = "Saved!"
  setTimeout(() => (els.status.textContent = ""), 1200)
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", load)
els.save.addEventListener("click", save)
